TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division B Regional 7
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

School Name:

Check your team: ◻ Varsity ◻ JV1 JV2 ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.183.cipherString: Make yourself an honest man, and then you may be sure that there is one rascal less in the world.
CIPHER.183.question: Decode this quote from Carlyle which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.183.author: CARLYLE

CIPHER.190.cipherString: Never let success get to your head and never let failure get to your heart.
CIPHER.190.question: The following quote by Ziad K. Abdelnour needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of POLES and polybius key of MAGNETOMETER.
CIPHER.190.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

CIPHER.189.cipherString: Poetry was given to us to hide the little discords of life and to make man contented with the world and his condition.
CIPHER.189.question: Solve this quote by Goethe that has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K2 keyword. You are told that it starts with POET.
CIPHER.189.author: Goethe

CIPHER.203.cipherString: It is in great perils we see great acts of daring.
CIPHER.203.question: The following odd symbols were found on a sheet of paper when a tomb was opened, but you recognized it as the Baconian alphabet, written by a prankster. It turns out to be a quote by Regnard.  What does it say?
CIPHER.203.author: Regnard.

CIPHER.185.cipherString: A focused man will walk a straighter path to all his successes and therefore will have more to gain.
CIPHER.185.question: Decode this quote from Roger Asselin which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.185.author: Roger Asselin

CIPHER.199.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 243156 153064 9304287. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.193.cipherString: Charity is the temple of which justice is the foundation, but you can't have the top without the bottom.
CIPHER.193.question: A quote by John Ruskin has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.193.author: John Ruskin

CIPHER.200.cipherString: Despite fear, don't forget to try, for you have to try to succeed.
CIPHER.200.question: A quote by Debasish Mridha has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has RY TO SU in it corresponding to the encoded text P V G X F Y U R V.
CIPHER.200.author: Debasish Mridha MD

CIPHER.201.cipherString: The older I get, the more I start to think that life is something to experience, not a game to win or lose
CIPHER.201.question: Decode this quote from Tsunami Umino which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.201.author: Tsunami Umino

CIPHER.197.cipherString: It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly.
CIPHER.197.question: Decode this quote from Isaac Asimov which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told that it contains the letters PHYOFLI.
CIPHER.197.author: Isaac Asimov

CIPHER.191.cipherString: My dotter tolled me she wands to bee a secrete agent. Based on that a loan, eye doughnut think she'd bee a good secrete agent.
CIPHER.191.question: Decode the message from an unknown source which was encoded with a K1 Aristocrat Cipher (after being run through a ‘sus' dictation system).
CIPHER.191.author: Unknown

CIPHER.184.cipherString: Its no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
CIPHER.184.question: The following quote by Lewis Carroll needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of TAPE.
CIPHER.184.author: Lewis Carroll

CIPHER.187.cipherString: Sometimes problems don't require a solution to solve them; instead they require maturity to outgrow them.
CIPHER.187.question: A quote by Steve Maraboli has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it ends with THEM.
CIPHER.187.author: Steve Maraboli

CIPHER.195.cipherString: Only start something if you intend to finish it, otherwise it is going to be a waste of resources.
CIPHER.195.question: Solve this quote from John Taskinsoy which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.195.author: JOHN TASKINSOY

CIPHER.204.cipherString: Lo que sembramos en la juventud lo cosechamos en la vejez; La semilla del cardo siempre produce el cardo.
CIPHER.204.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by J.T. Fields into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  It starts with LO QUE.
CIPHER.204.author: J.T. Fields
CIPHER.204.translation: What we sow in youth we reap in age; the seed of the thistle always produces the thistle.

CIPHER.192.cipherString: Anything that touches my heart holds the potential to inspire me.
CIPHER.192.question: Decode this quote from Suman Pokhrel which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told that it contains the letters HESMY.
CIPHER.192.author: Suman Pokhrel

CIPHER.205.cipherString: Let my honour be without stain.
CIPHER.205.question: The following motto needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=5 and b=22.
CIPHER.205.author: Motto

CIPHER.206.cipherString: Having somebody help you doesn't mean that you have failed. It just means that you're not in it alone
CIPHER.206.question: A quote by Eric Messer in ‘Life As We Know It’ has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.206.author: Messer (Life as we know it)

CIPHER.196.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 86341277 95063. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.194.cipherString: You can only be afraid of what you think you know.
CIPHER.194.question: The following letters encode a quote by Jiddu Krishnamurti using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?
CIPHER.194.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

CIPHER.188.question: The following quote by F. William Lawvere needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=15 and b=4.
CIPHER.188.author: F. William Lawvere

CIPHER.198.cipherString: No matter how hard life is, don't lose hope
CIPHER.198.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Zayn Malik using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text contains MATT somewhere.
CIPHER.198.author: Zayn Malik

CIPHER.186.cipherString: Anyone who writes about science must know about science, which cuts down competition considerably.
CIPHER.186.question: Decode this quote from Isaac Asimov which has been encoded with a Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.186.author: Isaac Asimov

CIPHER.207.cipherString: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
CIPHER.207.question: A quote by Wayne Dyer has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it starts with WHAT.
CIPHER.207.author: Wayne Dyer

CIPHER.202.cipherString: To be successful you don't have to be fast and fearless, but you need to be persistent.
CIPHER.202.question: The following quote by Debasish Mridha needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of ERAS and polybius key of PALEONTOLOGY.
CIPHER.202.author: Debasish Mridha
